dc_description_s: This point shapefile depicts locations of offshore oil platforms on the California coast.This coverage was developed for Department of Fish and Wildlife Office of Spill Prevention and Response to conduct business and use in reports.
dc_publisher_s: California. Department of Fish and Game. Marine Resources Region
dc_creator_sm: California. Department of Fish and Game. Marine Resources Region
